data.text:
“Had a great time with you guys last night. Look forward to catching a future show.” –Mike Y.

“Hot Mix of Rock-n-Roll, Country and Blues”

Our Story

Center Line is a Connecticut-based band made up of seasoned musicians playing a “Hot mix of Rock-n-Roll, Country and Blues”, featuring solid vocals, wailing harmonica and tasty guitar licks. They’re guaranteed to get the crowd moving and enjoying themselves with upbeat, get-up-and-dance song selections.

Center Line covers a wide range of music to satisfy a variety of musical tastes and can adapt to any venue. They play songs from Tom Petty, Blues Brothers, Eric Clapton, Chuck Berry, NRBQ, Elvis, Fabulous Thunderbirds, Eagles, Lynyrd Skynyrd, Muddy Waters, Bruce Springsteen, Credence, George Thorogood, Allman Brothers, Darrius Rucker, Delbert McClinton, Johnny Rivers, Stevie Ray Vaughn, and many, many more.

Band members play/played in top CT, New England and national touring bands including L&B All-Star Review, TireBiter, The Modeans, Plywood Cowboy, and many others. They’ve performed at some of most popular venues in the northeast, including Big E, Boston and Hartford First Nights, Music Mountain and many town Summer Concert Series and Festivals.

Center Line was nominated as Best Overall Band and Best Jam Band in the CTNow Best of Hartford reader’s poll in 2019, 2020, and again in 2023. For show dates, music samples, recent venues played and contact information, please click on the Menu button above.
